    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40d170b4-d460-4057-2d8f-70abe82f9ba7#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Krisztus siratása freskó, 1164. Nerezi, Hagia Panteleimon-templom.</string>
            <string language="en">Bewail over Christ fresco, 1164. Nerezi, Hagia Panteleimon Church.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beklagen Sie Überchrist Fresko, 1164. 
Nerezi, Hagia Panteleimon Kirche.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pleurez le fresque fini du Christ, 1164. 
Nerezi, Église de Hagia Panteleimon.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bewail o fresco excedente de Christ, 1164. 
Nerezi, Igreja De Hagia Panteleimon.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bewail il fresco eccessivo del Christ, 1164. 
Nerezi, Chiesa Di Hagia Panteleimon.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Bewail πέρα από τη νωπογραφία Χριστού, 1164, 
Nerezi, εκκλησία Hagia Panteleimon.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bewail el fresco excesivo de Cristo, 1164. 
Nerezi, Iglesia De Hagia Panteleimon.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A nerezi tempolm freskója Krisztus siratása.</string>
            <string language="en">The fresco of the Church of Nerez is Bewail for Christ</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Krisztus,  Krisztus siratása,  Nerezi,  bizánci művészet,  12. század,  Hagia Pantaleimon,  </string>
            <string language="en">Christ, Bewail for Christ, Nerez, Byzantine art, 12th century, Hagia Pantaleimon</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Fresko der Kirche von Nerez ist beklagen für Christ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le fresque de l'église de Nerez est pleurent pour le 
Christ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O fresco da igreja de Nerez é bewail para Christ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il fresco della chiesa di Nerez è bewail per Christ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η νωπογραφία της εκκλησίας Nerez είναι Bewail για
Χριστό</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El fresco de la iglesia de Nerez es bewail para 
Cristo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Christ, beklagen für Christ, Nerez, byzantinische 
kunst, 12. Jahrhundert, Hagia Pantaleimon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Christ, pleurent pour le Christ, Nerez, art bizantin,
le 12ème siècle, Hagia Pantaleimon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Christ, bewail para Christ, Nerez, arte byzantine, 1ò 
século, Hagia Pantaleimon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Christ, bewail per Christ, Nerez, l'arte byzantine, 
dodicesimo secolo, Hagia Pantaleimon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χριστός, Bewail για Χριστό, Nerez, βυζαντινή τέχνη, 
12$ος αιώνας, Hagia Pantaleimon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cristo, bewail para Cristo, Nerez, arte byzantine, 12mo
siglo, Hagia Pantaleimon</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
